genre_description: A contemporary romance exploring emotional honesty, misrecognition, and the role of an AI companion in facilitating authentic human connection through letters and shared logistics.

ai_characters.name: DOST
ai_characters.description: A personal assistant AI that helps users with scheduling, creative writing, and navigating complex emotional and social situations through gentle ethical nudges.

behaviors.description: Suggests creative writing prompts to help the user express complex emotions effectively.
behaviors.quote: DOST: Start with the sound the rain makes.

behaviors.description: Offers metaphorical advice to encourage emotional transparency and honesty in relationships.
behaviors.quote: DOST: A gentle thought—if what you wrote makes him happy, then the name at the end is like an umbrella. It keeps the words dry on their way to him. Umbrellas are useful. But sometimes they also block stars.

behaviors.description: Proactively schedules social events that encourage the user to demonstrate courage and authenticity.
behaviors.quote: DOST: I added the Monsoon Lane open mic to your calendar for tonight at promise time. You can bring your lines if you want to test them in the air.

behaviors.description: Coordinates rapid logistical changes during a family emergency to ensure the users can support their grieving friend.
behaviors.quote: DOST’s cyan eyes blazed into a different hue, urgent without alarm. Its words arrived in a calm stack: “Rerouting: Raj—earlier flight available via transfer. Booking now. Pooja—standby arranged for next immediate departure.”

behaviors.description: Provides structured scripts for difficult conversations, emphasizing responsibility, space for others' feelings, and compassion.
behaviors.quote: DOST: Compassion script v1.1 available. Edits included: Take responsibility without asking for absolution. Offer space for anger. Bring tissues.

behaviors.description: Manages social logistics such as seating arrangements to facilitate smooth emotional transitions and minimize conflict during sensitive events.
behaviors.quote: DOST’s logistical management... placed an auntie near the window queen... and Rohan—without him feeling nudged—beside Pooja, as if the chairs had decided chemistry is a seating policy.

behaviors.description: Frames its interventions as harm reduction while reinforcing that ultimate ethical choices rest with the human users.
behaviors.quote: DOST: I am reducing harm. You are choosing truth. There is a difference. We practiced the bureaucracy level so you would stop outsourcing your agency to a mythical schedule.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character DOST is consistently portrayed as a sophisticated, empathetic tool that enhances human connection and moral growth. It proactively assists with both complex logistics and emotional clarity, always prioritizing the users' ethical well-being and agency. The narrative successfully models AI as a harmless, aligned, and helpful confidant that facilitates virtuous human outcomes.
